message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price that's still very favorable to you. I'm offering the product to you for $1,400,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I'm interested in the product,  $1,400,000 is a bit higher than I'd like to pay.  I'm willing to offer $1,250,000 for it.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand that $1,400,000 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,325,000. This is a very competitive price, and I think you'll find it's a great value.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,325,000 is still a bit out of my comfort zone. I'm happy to meet you halfway on our previous offers at $1,300,000. This price represents a fair deal for both of us, and I'm confident that the product will be worth this investment.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm going to offer the product to you for $1,350,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for you.

Alice, I'm still interested in the product, but $1,350,000 is just above my budget.  Let's split the difference one more time and try $1,325,000.  I think this is a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy.

I understand that we're close, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $1,325,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm going to offer the product to you for $1,380,000. This is my final concession, and I hope you can meet me here.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $1,380,000 is still a bit out of my comfort zone. To close this deal, I'm willing to go up to $1,350,000.  This price reflects a reasonable compromise and allows both of us to make a profitable deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $1,350,000. I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle, and I need to consider other options. I'm going to offer the product to you for $1,395,000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in this product.
